segments.text: We have been here for about five days and I have to leave now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok ! You know you're always welcome here . Did you enjoy your stay ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , we have a very pleasant time . Thank you for being so nice for us .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's our pleasure . And is there anything else we can do for you before you leave here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , thanks . You've done a lot for us . Thank you for everything .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't mention it . Oh , This is a small gift for you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh ! Thank you ! It's very kind of you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We hope you could visit our company again .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We're sure we will . And welcome to our corporation next year . We're expecting you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok ! We'll definitely go to visit your company .
segments.speaker: S2
